name: Season 1: Episode 12
headline: Skin Toxicities from Immune Checkpoint Inhibitors (PART 1): Common and perplexing
hosts:
Learn from the experts about the latest in Onco- Dermatology and Immune skin Mediated toxicities. Join our hosts Dr. Afreen Shariff and Dr. Tian Zhang as they discuss with guest expert and Dermatologist Dr. Meenal Kheterpal. 
Dr. Kheterpal is a Dermatologist, Assistant Professor of Dermatology at Duke University School of Medicine. She also directs clinical research in Melanoma and Non - Melanoma Skin Cancer at Duke Dermatology.
